titleStmt.title: Tiruviśalūr, Śivayōganātha temple, no king, c.a. 12th century

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

msContents.summary: It gives a list of the several temple servants who were recipients of money, but it is not clear from whom and on what account

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
viruta-rāja-bhayaṅkara-vaḷanāṭṭu maṇṇināṭṭu coḻamāttāṇṭa caru-p-peti-
maṅkalamuṭaiya tiruvicalūruṭaiya mahātevar koyilil coḻa-konār muppiyā
r Aravintan Uttamāṇṭiyār makan niṟaṇintān poṟkoyil Aṇukka nampiyum I-t-teēvar
tiru-k-kuḷattil vaṭa-kuḷaṅ-karaiyil Ivarkaḷ Eṭuppitta nāṟpatteṇṇuyiravar tirumaṭattu
kku teēvar-Aṭiyārai Amutu-ceyvikkaikkum Āḷuṭaiyārkku tiru-mantira-p ponōṉakattukkum
I-t-t-eēvar śrī paṇṭārattu nāṅkaḷ Oṭukkukoṇṭu palicaikku kāṭṭiya kai-y-piḻai-pāṭum pe
rāṟṟu ṉiḻiccappaṭṭatu nāḷum I-p-poruḷukku munpu tiricciṟṟampala-muṭaiyār koyililum munpi
l copānattilum veṭṭina kal-veṭṭu-p piḻaiyātanmaiyilum puravacam kācu-koṇṭa
paṭi I-k-koyilil kāṇiyuṭaiya civabrāhmaṇa n paāratāyan tiruvicalūr ceḻa-māṇikkam tan nāḷu
kkum tampi tiruvicalūr Eṇṇariyaān nāḷukkum piccanṉ tiruvicalūr nāḷukkum Āka ceḻa-māṇikka
m koṇṭa kācu patinṉ-āṟu Itil mantira-p-ponōṉakam celutta kāc-iraṇṭ-arai nikki maṭattukku pa
licaikku koṇṭa kācu patinṉ-munṟ-arai Āritankālukkum Ivan māman
civapaṭṭāla karkku cimukkālukkum maṟaikkāṭan koṇṭa kācu mukkā
ṇi // Itil mantira-p-ponōṉakattukku niṅkuṅ kācu Arai pāratāyan tiruvicalūr kaṅkaikkoṇṭān tan
nāḷukkum tiruvicalūr Eṇṇariyāṉ nāḷukkum Uṭaiyavaṉ nāḷukkum piccanṉ tiruvicalūr nāḷukkum muṭiko
ṇṭān piccan nāḷukkum tirukkaḻippālai Uṭaiyār koyil kāṇi Uṭaiya jeyatarabrahmarāyar koṇ
ṭa kācu Iraṇṭ-araiyum Āka nān koṇṭa kācu Irupat-t-āṟe-kālum Uḷpaṭa Itil mantira-poō
nṉakattāl niṅkuṅ kācu nāl-arai maṭattukku kācu Irupat-t-onṟe mukkālum n caṅkaran civacoki munpi
l kal-veṭṭuḷ-paṭa nāḷ-opātikku koṇṭa kācu patiṉeṭṭu mantira ponōṉakattukku niṅkuṅ kācu Iraṇṭum
maṭattukku niṅkuṅ kācu
kūttan piccanṉum
pāratāyan Arumoḻi-c cūriyan En naāḷukku koṇṭa kācu Eḻarai Itil mantira-poōnṉakattukku
niṅkuṅ kācu Onṟ-arai nikki maṭattukku kācu Āṟu Ukaccan vikkavināyakan picca maṭattukku koṇ
ṭa kāc-iraṇṭ-arai pāratāyan Arumoḻi Īcāna-paṭṭanum Ivan makan Uyyakkoṇṭānum kūtta
n piccaṉ nāḷukkum nān koṇṭa kācu pattu Itil mantira-p-ponōṉakattukku niṅkuṅ kācu Onṟe-mu-k-kāl
nikki maṭattukku kācu Eṭṭe-kāl I-k-koyil kuca-k-kāṇi-y-āḷarom caṇṭesuran cuntaranum Aṭi
kaḷ cuppiramaṇṇiyanum piccanṉuṭaiyarum piccanṉ tiriṉampiyum Uḷḷiṭṭa kucavarom maṭattu
kku koṇṭa kācu Onṟu Uvaccan Āṭavallān cirāḷan koṇṭa kācu Iraṇṭ-arai maṭattukku palicaikku
ciṅkamāṇi ponnan tiru-mey-kāval paṅkukku koṇṭa kācu Onṟu tillai vanamuṭaiyān Ānantavār
kaḻal tiru-mey-kāval paṅkukku koṇṭa kācu Onṟu pāratāyan kaṅkai koṇṭān ceyya pātatten En
nāḷukku koṇṭa kāc-iraṇṭum maṭattukku palicai Aḷakka kaliyarāman piccanṉāna munṉaippāṭi nāṭṭu veēḷār ma
kannāna kāḷiyiṭaiyānpakkal koṇṭa nāḷ-araikkum celvan piccan nāḷ-araikkum
Nampi Āḷkoṇṭa nāyakan nāḷ mukkālukkum Āka koṇṭa kācu Iraṇṭe-mu-k-kāle Arai-k-kāl
